sentences.en: 'Emigrant ,'said the functionary,'I am going to send you on to Paris, under an escort.'
sentences.cn: “ 外逃分子, ” 那官员说, “ 我要把你送到巴黎去, 还派人护送. ”

sentences.en: 'It is always as the good patriot says,'observed the functionary.
sentences.cn: “ 这位好心的爱国者说的话总是对的, ” 那官员说.

sentences.en: Have system of whole functionary office class grandly, top salary gives the most outstanding talented person.
sentences.cn: 盛大有完整的职务职级体系, 最高的工资给最优秀的人才.

sentences.en: Physiology maturity is grow as body functionary and mature.
sentences.cn: 生理成熟是随着身体机能的生长而成熟.

sentences.en: The current functionary crime seriously hinders the process of affairs according to law.
sentences.cn: 当前的职务犯罪问题严重阻碍着依法治国的进程.

sentences.en: The Secretariat , an organ operating under WFCMS, is responsible for WFCMS's functionary management.
sentences.cn: 世界中联下设秘书处, 为世界中联的日常工作机构.

trans.tran_en: someone who has a job doing unimportant or boring official duties
